title: Nigel Kennedy - The Four Seasons (Vivaldi)
description:
Nigel Kennedy - The Four Seasons (Vivaldi)

Violin	Nigel Kennedy
English Chamber Orchesra

mp3 192 kbits

-------- Tracks -----------
01 Conserto No 1 La Primavera (The Spring)
02 Conserto No 1 La Primavera (The Spring)
03 Conserto No 1 La Primavera (The Spring)
04 Conserto No 2 L'estate (The Summer)
05 Conserto No 2 L'estate (The Summer)
04 Conserto No 2 L'estate (The Summer)
06 Conserto No 3 L'Autumno (The Automn)
07 Conserto No 3 L'Autumno (The Automn)
08 Conserto No 3 L'Autumno (The Automn)
09 Conserto No 4 L'inverno (The Winter)
10 Conserto No 4 L'inverno (The Winter)
11 Conserto No 4 L'inverno (The Winter)

If hearing The Four Seasons by Vivaldi make you groan for something new, you ought to give this recording a chance. Performed and directed by Kennedy, this album is a surprising piece of art. The fast movements are driven and powerfully exhilarating while the luscious slow movements provide the perfect contrast. Throughout the recording Kennedy adds the necessary touches that make this a well developed art project: exciting embelishments befitting the piece and composer, cadenzas (some of his own) that add to the flow of the movements, and a steady stream of passion that captivates the ear. Instilled with feeling, this recording of the much over-played Four Seasons leaves the listener looking for more from Nigel Kennedy.
